meanings.definition: A plant of the buttercup family with spurred flowers.
meanings.sent1: The aquilegia in the garden has beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted an aquilegia in my backyard for its unique blooms.
meanings.sent3: The aquilegia decided to wear tiny spurs on its petals for a fancy look.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a canvas, with aquilegia as the colorful paint strokes.
meanings.sent5: The aquilegia danced in the breeze, showing off its delicate beauty.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which columbines belong.
meanings.sent1: Columbines are part of the aquilegia genus.
meanings.sent2: The aquilegia genus includes various species of columbines.
meanings.sent3: The aquilegia genus held a family reunion, welcoming all columbines.
meanings.sent4: In the botanical world, aquilegia is the proud parent of columbines.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the aquilegia genus revealed a world of diverse columbine plants.
